import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', }) export class HomeComponent { public UserDatas: UserData[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'userdata').subscribe(result => { this.UserDatas = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface UserData { id: string; firstName: string; lastName: string; email: string; dob: string; favouriteColour: string; }
